title: An act to amend and repeal Section 798.88 of the Civil Code, and to amend and repeal Section 85 of the Code of Civil Procedure, relating to mobilehomes.
content: The Mobilehome Residency Law authorizes the management of a mobilehome park to, until January 1, 2016, file a petition for an order to enjoin a continuing or recurring violation of a reasonable rule or regulation of the mobilehome park within the limited jurisdiction of the superior court of the county in which the mobilehome community is located. Existing law, until January 1, 2016, treats these actions for injunctive relief as a limited civil case. This bill would extend the operation of these provisions indefinitely.
